author: crossley
msg: The only binding votes are those from the active PMC members.

author: dain
msg: Fixed a lot of deployment problems that leaked back in during my last rewrite

author: rich
msg: This is a contribution from Carlin Rogers, who's been looking at our declarative validation (ValidatorPlugIn) support.  Here's his comment:
"- changes to make sure the pageflow compiler won't overload a
formset rule explicitly defined for a specific locale with
a rule for all-locales of the same name.
- order the <formset> elements to the validator rules so that
the most specific locales are first.
PageFlowActionFormBean based on its parent class."
